segments.text: You mean the large one or the small one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They're on special this week . They've been reduced to five dollars .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is this the only kind you have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . We have some that are different in style but not in color . They're over there . Do you see the sign ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , yes . I think I'll look at those over there before I decide .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very well . Just take your time .
segments.speaker: S2
